reviewText: Can not be played in the US, and seller didn't say that..First video I have ever heard of Region 2 playback only.. My child was very upset, and couldn't understand it wouldnt play and it was new....
Didn't know it wouldn't play...till I got it...wrong region?
Zero stars.  These DVDs do not play on standard DVD players.  Region 2, run from these movies
The movie did not work. I was very disappointed in it as well as my daughter who loves peppa pig. And i couldn't send it back because there was not a return address to mail it back.
this product did not explain that it would not work in US. I know the show is a UK show but thought the dvd's were made to play in the US. I had a very unhappy 4 year old on Christmas morning...
Awesome movie but take notice that it is in a PAL format. Need a multi regional player to play it in U.S.
